skins.shipDescription: First ship of the Takao-class heavy cruisers, Takao.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Takao, first ship of the Takao-class heavy cruisers. I may not look like it, but I have already crossed through countless battlefields. Please place your faith in my firepower and armor, and be at ease.
skins.acquisition: Are you the Commander? Please allow this lowly Takao to offer you what little strength she has.
skins.login: Takao standing by. What are your orders?
skins.details: Small strokes fell great oaks, constant drops pierce through rock. Those who train through the most humdrum of days shall seize victory in the most critical of moments. That is my belief.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Even back in port, we must not lower our guard. Danger lurks around every corner.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, not even you could withstand my blade.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Daily refinement means to continually strive towards your goals. Commander, may your focus never falter.
skins.secretaryTouch: E-enemies?! Oh... It was you, Commander? Apologies - my eyesight isn't the best.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Kyaa! You scared me... how shameless!

skins.shipDescription: Commander, I've been undertaking countless bride training sessions in order to prepare for this day. As your bride, I won't let you down.
skins.acquisition: Commander, I've been undertaking countless bride training sessions in order to prepare for this day. As your bride, I won't let you down.
skins.login: Commander, come and try my cooking.
skins.details: I brought my katana with me in this wedding dress. It's just hiding somewhere that you cannot see.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I think that each and every day we spend together is a blessing.
skins.secretaryIdle2: After today's training, I will replenish our food supply... am I... a good wife? N-nothing.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Atago said that my expressions have been softened recently, heehee, that's because now I smile whenever I think of you.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, please focus on the work... or are you purposely teasing me just to see my troubled face?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: C-Commander, we are still in the office...

skins.shipDescription: Commander, even I’ll get embarrassed if you keep staring at me like that... Eh? Why did I bring a volleyball? Did you not order me to bring it?
skins.acquisition: Commander, even I’ll get embarrassed if you keep staring at me like that... Eh? Why did I bring a volleyball? Did you not order me to bring it?
skins.login: Of course I can sympathize with the others. In this kind of heat, it is important to get some rest. However, we mustn’t neglect our training!
skins.details: I may have lost to Miss Saratoga in sandcastle building, but I shall redeem myself in beach volleyball.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Miss Saratoga wants to challenge me? Fine. Swimming, volleyball... just name it. I’ll take her on.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Atago, did you bring my sunglasses?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Relax, Commander. I didn’t bring this kendo sword to hit you with. It’s because I heard that someone from the Royal Navy is going to be here. Heh, just kidding. It’s because Atago is scared of ghosts~
skins.secretaryTouch: The younger girls are all so energetic... Commander, did you know you can tell their age by when they were launched?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Don’t touch me! I’m working on a sand castle... it has to be at least 70% bigger than Sara’s!

skins.shipDescription: Calligraphy is also a form of self-cultivation, so I am instructing the children... Commander, would you also like to join?
skins.acquisition: Calligraphy is also a form of self-cultivation, so I am instructing the children... Commander, would you also like to join?
skins.login: Commander, welcome back. Pardon me for making a mess; I'll clean it up right away.
skins.details: Oh no, the ink... Commander, don't step on the paper!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Qipao? Atago picked it out, saying you like this kind of outfit. How is it?
skins.secretaryIdle2: What? "Fortune" is the only thing that needs to be written? I thought I could write whatever I wanted...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, can I try writing your name next? Hm? No particular reason... I just felt like it.
skins.secretaryTouch: It would be great if I could really bring "Fortune" to Commander and everyone else with my calligraphy.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander?! I-I won't be able to write like this...!

skins.shipDescription: Hmm... school life, huh? It's a fairly fresh experience for me. Would it be fine to pin my hair up like this? What do you think, Commander?
skins.acquisition: Hmm... school life, huh? It's a fairly fresh experience for me. Would it be fine to pin my hair up like this? What do you think, Commander?
skins.login: Woah! C-Commander? When did you get here? I-I'm sorry, I'm still not ready yet...
skins.details: A balanced school life is a part of the responsibilites here. Surely, I will develop valuable and translatable skills through the process of going to school.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, even if you're at school, you can't slack off too much!
skins.secretaryIdle2: What clubs am I interested in joining... I wonder if there's a kendo club...
skins.secretaryIdle3: This uniform was supposed to fit, so why is it so tight... C-Commander?! What are you staring at!?
skins.secretaryTouch: This Woofy strap here? Atago gave it to me and said it'd help me look less uptight. Jeez, I'm not uptight at all...

skins.shipDescription: Ugh... S-such shameless attire... If not for Atago saying that it would benefit me to experience different things...! It looks good on me?! I, I see...
skins.acquisition: Ugh... S-such shameless attire... If not for Atago saying that it would benefit me to experience different things...! It looks good on me?! I, I see...
skins.login: Sitting in this same pose is rather tiring, but this is also part of my training. After all, improving my flexibility should not be something that goes to waste...
skins.details: I will give my all to fulfill any task I've been assigned... B-but, Commander, could you not stare at me so much? It's a bit... embarrassing...
skins.secretaryIdle1: The flashes from the camera are a bit too bright, but worry not about me. Commander, I shall face down each and every challenge before me.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I should try to maintain my smile at times like these? If you say so... then I shall do as you advised to the utmost of my ability.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, would you mind holding onto my parasol for a bit? I need to fix my hair accessory...
skins.secretaryTouch: I should change my pose to make it easier to take pictures? V-very well... Ugh... Th-this is too embarrassing after all...!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: I, I'm still working right now...!
